name: Lava Run (PandaTimmyMrT)
description:
Hello! This is my Submission for the game jam "what-a-jam". Probably spend more than 16h on creating this project. If it won't react when you press space then please reload the game! [ My best score was 620 ]

INSTRUCTIONS

WASD / arrow keys to move

Space to dash

X to delete

C to copy

V to paste

Oh no, the lava is coming! Run away from the Lava, press X to delete objects, press C to copy objects and press V to paste the copied Item. Paste items on pressure plates to open gates. You can only paste items on the pressure plate if the item you want to paste onto the pressure plate matches to the icon of the pressure plate. Destroying objects gives you Points. You can dash through lava-rivers. PRESS Q FOR SOMETHING SPECIAL.

WHERE YOU COULD PUT YOUR FINGERS

right hand on the arrow keys, left thumb on space, left index finger on V, middle finger on C and ring finger on X

PLEASE READ IF YOU ARE WHATEEP

Actually you had to press shift and x/c/v to run a movement ( like shortcuts ), but it was too difficult to play it with shift so I had to remove shift.

CREDITS

Music: "Undertale OST: 059 - Spider Dance", programmed on TurboWarp.org. All art and code by PandaTimmyMrT ( me ).
